00030 // Emulate _findfirst, _findnext on non-Windows platforms
00031 
00032 
00033 #include <string.h>
00034 #include <sys/types.h>
00035 #include <sys/stat.h>
00036 #include <stdlib.h>
00037 
00038 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
00039 
00040 #if OGRE_PLATFORM != OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00041 
00042 #include <dirent.h>
00043 #include <unistd.h>
00044 #include <fnmatch.h>
00045 
00046 /* Our simplified data entry structure */
00047 struct _finddata_t
00048 {
00049     char *name;
00050     int attrib;
00051     unsigned long size;
00052 };
00053 
00054 #define _A_NORMAL 0x00  /* Normalfile-Noread/writerestrictions */
00055 #define _A_RDONLY 0x01  /* Read only file */
00056 #define _A_HIDDEN 0x02  /* Hidden file */
00057 #define _A_SYSTEM 0x04  /* System file */
00058 #define _A_SUBDIR 0x10  /* Subdirectory */
00059 #define _A_ARCH   0x20  /* Archive file */
00060 
00061 long _findfirst(const char *pattern, struct _finddata_t *data);
00062 int _findnext(long id, struct _finddata_t *data);
00063 int _findclose(long id);
00064 
00065 #endif
